416.question: How many layers does the UTCNN model have?

4-Figure2-1.png: The UTCNN model has three layers: Document Composition, Document Representation, and Maximum Pooling.</s>
The UTCNN model has three layers: 'Document Label', 'Document Composition', and 'Comment Composition'.</s>
3-Figure1-1.png: The UTCNN model has three layers: Document Representation, Average Pooling, and Maximum Pooling.</s>
The UTCNN model has three layers: Document Representation, Average Pooling, and Maximum Pooling.</s>

422.question: Did they collected the two datasets?

5-Table1-1.png: Yes, they collected the two datasets.</s>
Yes, they collected both the FBFans and CreateDebate datasets.</s>
